testsuite.name: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "How Did I Do? Lesson"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I create question "Formula Question" with label "Formula Question Label"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the lesson question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: When I click on the Properties tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then I check How Did I Do is checked by default in lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: When I save & close the lesson on the properties page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I save and close the lesson summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "How Did I Do? Lesson" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I click on the "How Did I Do? Lesson" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then the module "How Did I Do? Lesson" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: When I enter "2x" in Mathematical Formula input
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then I click How Did I Do in the lesson page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Mathematical Formula answer is correct
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: Then I save and quit the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test How Did I Do? when taking a lesson

testsuite.system-out: @Lesson @LessonEditor Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present ?[90m# ManageLesson.feature:37?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32menter Lesson name "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson without Submit?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.enterAssignmentName(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI save & close the lesson on the design page?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.saveAndCloseLesson()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see summary of the lesson with warning text "?[0m?[32m?[1mWARNING: Empty section?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.assertNoQuestionsInAssignmentWarningMessageIsDisplayed(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI save it anyway?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.saveAssignmentAnyway()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the breadcrumb to return to the class homepage?[0m ?[90m# PageLoadingSteps.returnToClassHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click on the "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson without Submit?[0m?[32m" module in the "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" unit?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.clickOnModuleLink(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe module "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson without Submit?[0m?[32m" is opened without launch page?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.switchToModulePage(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI do not see the "Submit Lesson" button?[0m ?[90m# LessonSteps.assertSubmitLessonButtonNotPresent()?[0m
